mapper.insert: insert into MGV_SUPPORT_ONE (one_title, one_content, one_filename, user_id, user_name, user_email, location_no, theater_no, category_no, one_guest_name, one_guest_email, one_guest_password) VALUES ('#{title}', '#{content}', '#{fileName}', '#{user.id}', '#{user.name}', '#{user.email}', '#{location.no}', '#{theater.no}', '#{category.no}', '#{guestName}', '#{guestEmail}', '#{guestPassword}');
